languages.text: "А потом ты запретил{mf||а} Пощаде смотреть на меня, как на девочку, нуждающуюся в нем... Знаешь, ты, возможно, перв{mf|ый|ая}, кто сделал{mf||а} это для меня. Кто не попытал{mf|ся|ась} под предлогом любви переделать меня, кто не ждал{mf||а}, что я буду соответствовать навешенным ярлыкам".

"And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."
languages.original_text: "А потом ты запретил{mf||а} Пощаде смотреть на меня, как на девочку, нуждающуюся в нем... Знаешь, ты, возможно, перв{mf|ый|ая}, кто сделал{mf||а} это для меня. Кто не попытал{mf|ся|ась} под предлогом любви переделать меня, кто не ждал{mf||а}, что я буду соответствовать навешенным ярлыкам".

traits.locale_text: "And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

"And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

"And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

"And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

languages.text: “后来，你命令悯慈，不准他再把我当成一个需要他的小女孩……或许，你是第一个为我这么做的人。你并没有以爱我为借口，试图改变我，也没有期望我改变自己的形象，来满足你脑中对我的想象。或许，你是第一个这么对待我的人。”
languages.original_text: "And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

traits.locale_text: “后来，你命令悯慈，不准他再把我当成一个需要他的小女孩……或许，你是第一个为我这么做的人。你并没有以爱我为借口，试图改变我，也没有期望我改变自己的形象，来满足你脑中对我的想象。或许，你是第一个这么对待我的人。”

languages.text: 「そして、アンタはマーシーに、アタシを彼を必要とする小さな女の子として見るのを止めるよう命じた…アタシのためにそうしてくれたのは、アンタが初めてかもしれない。アタシを愛しているという口実でアタシを変えようとせず、頭の中で作り上げたアタシに、アタシを合わせようとしない人は」
languages.original_text: "And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、アンタはマーシーに、アタシを彼を必要とする小さな女の子として見るのを止めるよう命じた…アタシのためにそうしてくれたのは、アンタが初めてかもしれない。アタシを愛しているという口実でアタシを変えようとせず、頭の中で作り上げたアタシに、アタシを合わせようとしない人は」

languages.text: «También ordenó a Mercy que dejara de verme como a una niña pequeña que lo necesitaba... Es la primera persona que hace eso por mí. Que no intenta cambiarme usando el pretexto de su amor por mí y no espera que me adapte a la idea de mí que han creado en sus mentes».
languages.original_text: "And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

traits.locale_text: «También ordenó a Mercy que dejara de verme como a una niña pequeña que lo necesitaba... Es la primera persona que hace eso por mí. Que no intenta cambiarme usando el pretexto de su amor por mí y no espera que me adapte a la idea de mí que han creado en sus mentes».

languages.text: « Puis vous avez ordonné à Mercy d'arrêter de me traiter comme une petite fille qui avait besoin de lui... Je crois que vous êtes {mf|le premier|la première} à avoir fait ça pour moi. {mf|Le premier|La première} qui n'a pas cherché à me faire changer sous prétexte qu'{mf|il|elle} m'aimait, qui n'attend pas que je me conforme à l'idée qu'{mf|il|elle} s'est faite de moi. »
languages.original_text: "And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

traits.locale_text: « Puis vous avez ordonné à Mercy d'arrêter de me traiter comme une petite fille qui avait besoin de lui... Je crois que vous êtes {mf|le premier|la première} à avoir fait ça pour moi. {mf|Le premier|La première} qui n'a pas cherché à me faire changer sous prétexte qu'{mf|il|elle} m'aimait, qui n'attend pas que je me conforme à l'idée qu'{mf|il|elle} s'est faite de moi. »

languages.text: "Und dann gabt Ihr Mercy den Befehl, mich nicht mehr als kleines Mädchen anzusehen, das ihn brauchen würde ... Vielleicht wart Ihr der erste Mensch, der so etwas für mich getan hat. {mf|Der|Die} nicht vorgibt, mich zu lieben, um mich zu ändern. Und {mf|der|die} nicht erwartet, dass ich der Vorstellung entspreche, die {mf|er|sie} von mir hat."
languages.original_text: "And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

traits.locale_text: "Und dann gabt Ihr Mercy den Befehl, mich nicht mehr als kleines Mädchen anzusehen, das ihn brauchen würde ... Vielleicht wart Ihr der erste Mensch, der so etwas für mich getan hat. {Mf|Der|Die} nicht vorgibt, mich zu lieben, um mich zu ändern. Und {mf|der|die} nicht erwartet, dass ich der Vorstellung entspreche, die {mf|er|sie} von mir hat."

languages.original_text: "And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

languages.text: "Sonra da Merhamet'e beni, ona ihtiyacı olan küçük bir kız olarak görmeyi bırakmasını emretmiştin. Benim için böyle bir şey yapan ilk kişi sen olabilirsin. Beni sevme bahanesiyle değiştirmeye çalışmayan, kafasında inşa ettiği Jae fikrine uyum sağlamamı beklemeyen..."
languages.original_text: "And then you ordered Mercy to stop seeing me as a little girl who needed him... You might be the first person who's ever done that for me. Who hasn't tried to change me on the pretext of loving me, who doesn't expect me to conform to the idea of me they've built in their head."

traits.locale_text: "Sonra da Merhamet'e beni, ona ihtiyacı olan küçük bir kız olarak görmeyi bırakmasını emretmiştin. Benim için böyle bir şey yapan ilk kişi sen olabilirsin. Beni sevme bahanesiyle değiştirmeye çalışmayan, kafasında inşa ettiği Jae fikrine uyum sağlamamı beklemeyen..."
